chapter.text: “THERE'S A MONSTER!”^500 You quickly explain.^1500 “Or some kind of large^500.^500.^500. guy?^1000 Thing?^1000 I'm not really sure...^1500 I think it’s been following me.^1500  I tried getting out through a window, and it tried to grab me, I think it wants to KILL ME or something.”^1500 You explain how the windows have been locked, and the janitor takes a long sigh.
